mapper.select: select * from review where parent_seq = #{parent_seq} order by 1 desc
select review.*, map.name from review, map where review.parent_seq = map.seq and review.id = #{value}
mapper.update: update review set report = report + 1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select review.*, map.name, row_number() over(order by review.${targetColumn} desc, review.seq desc) as rnum from review, map where review.parent_seq = map.seq) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select review.*, map.name from review, map where review.seq = #{seq} and review.parent_seq = map.seq

select id, parent_seq,(select name from map where seq = parent_seq), content from (select parent_seq, content, id, row_number() over(partition by parent_seq order by rating desc,length(content) desc) rank from review where parent_seq in (#{top1},#{top2},#{top3},#{top4},#{top5})) where rank = 1 order by parent_seq desc
